Class CommandAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • controller.CommandAPI

  • public class CommandAPI
extends java.util.Observable
    Controller class. Responsible for the instantiation of the commands (reading the persisted model), and the execution of the command.
